TEXT.TITLE: ARMATRON <ART> NEGOTIATES NEW CREDIT LINE
TEXT.BODY: Armatron International Inc said it negotiated a new seasonal line of credit with three lenders for 10 mln dlrs for working capital requirements to support its lawn and garden product line. Reuter
